recipes.name: Tomato and fenugreek chutney
steps: In a pan pour some oil, add red chili powder, urad dal, onion, fenugreek leaves, coriander leaves, green chili, tomatoes. Saut√© the mixture till moisture is absorbed and ingredients is cooked.
Add in tamarind water and season the mixture with salt.
Grind the mixture and keep aside
Heat oil add mustard seeds, curry leaves and red chili for tempering.
